pages.title: Attraction
elements: If someone were to ask you 'what is the opposite of a repulsion spell, what would you say? An attraction spell, of course!
By twisting the purpose of the protection spell, I've been able to reverse its function to create a spell that pulls objects and entities closer to the caster.

- 1 protection gem
- At least 10x strength trait
- At least 8x knowledge trait
- At least 9x air trait
+ 10x focus to narrow the effect's range to items specifically
